title: intro
text: vignette introduces transcribe package. package provides R interface transcribe audio using Whisper, optional post‐processing via Ollama. supports programmatic interface command-line interface (CLI).

title: intro
code: # Install from GitHub (if not on CRAN yet) # install.packages("remotes") remotes::install_github("YourUserName/transcribe")

title: intro
text: minimal example showing transcribe audio file:
code: # library(transcribe) # Uncomment once your package is installed # transcript <- transcribe_audio( #   input_path = "path/to/audio.wav", #   language = "en", #   whisper_model_name = "large-v3-turbo", #   processed = TRUE, #   ollama_model = "llama3.2" # ) # cat(transcript)

title: intro
text: transcribe package also provides command-line interface (CLI). installed, can run CLI terminal. example, script set inst/scripts/cli.R, can execute: command process specified audio file save resulting transcript transcribe.txt.
code: Rscript inst/scripts/cli.R -i "path/to/audio.wav" -l en -m large-v3-turbo -p TRUE -M llama3.2 -o "transcribe.txt"

title: intro
text: can serve web interface via plumber: open browser http://127.0.0.1:7608 access interface.

title: intro
text: vignette covered basics installing using transcribe audio transcription, including examples programmatic usage command-line usage. details, refer package documentation additional vignettes.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Last F (2025). transcribe: Package (One Line, Title Case). R package version 0.0.0.9001, https://brancengregory.github.io/transcribe/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {transcribe: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)},   author = {First Last},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9001},   url = {https://brancengregory.github.io/transcribe/}, }

what: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: transcribe package provides R interface audio transcription using Whisper, optional post‐processing via Ollama. also includes sample plumber API web interface command-line interface (CLI).

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
code: library(transcribe)  # Transcribe a local audio file transcript <- transcribe_audio(   input_path = "path/to/audio.wav",   language = "en",   whisper_model_name = "large-v3-turbo",   processed = TRUE,   ollama_model = "llama3.2" ) cat(transcript)

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: use CLI, run following command terminal: command transcribe audio file save output transcribe.txt.
code: Rscript inst/scripts/cli.R -i "path/to/audio.wav" -l en -m large-v3-turbo -p TRUE -M llama3.2 -o "transcribe.txt"

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: can also serve web interface via plumber: open browser http://127.0.0.1:7608 access transcription interface.

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)

what: Allowed Whisper models for transcription. — allowed_whisper_models
title: Allowed Whisper models for transcription. — allowed_whisper_models
Allowed Whisper models for transcription. — allowed_whisper_models
